text: Lieutenant General Lâm Quang Thi (7 May 1932 – 19 January 2021) was a Vietnamese senior military officer in the Army of the Republic of Vietnam. He was active from 1950 to 1975 including the Vietnam War. Thi was born in Bạc Liêu, French Indochina. Thi died on 19 January 2021 in Fremont, California at the age of 88 from COVID-19. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Vietnamese generals Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in California
title: Lâm Quang Thi
